value:
$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Over here! Dream-King Freyr
is very close.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Yes, he is. But you will never
make it to his side...$k$pYour path ends here.$k$p$Sbs1000|
$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I can't...go anywhere yet...$k$pI must...keep protecting—$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Stop it... Don't hurt her...
Don't hurt my sister...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|It's all right... Don't you worry...
I'll protect you... You're perfectly
safe with me.$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...safe with me...
Th-that was...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Have you returned to us, Triandra?$k$pGood. Then, with me. We must
follow them.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Yes, Lady Freyja...$k$p...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|What's wrong, Triandra?$k$pOh, you poor thing... Your eyes tell
me memories from your mortal life
must have been visiting you...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|The poverty you and your sister
were born into...so tragic.$k$pThe man your mother married was
cruel...and relentlessly so.$k$pYou two were starved and made to
sleep outside, even in winter, with
rags as your only shelter.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Your sister would have died that day,
had you not killed your father...$k$pYou did what you had to do to save
your beloved sister... So do not be
troubled by guilt.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...Yes, Lady Freyja. I'm all right.$k$pI... Thanks to you, Lady Freyja...
I am more now than I ever could
have been...$k$pNow, I am Triandra...dökkálfr
of Dökkálfheimr... I am yours.$k$p$Sbs150|
